item.description:
Join me, as we Ride the Shoreline, in Warwick.  I am still putting the finishing touches on this Ride.   We start South of Rocky Point, along a Coastal Road, appropriately  called Sea View Drive.   We Journey thru the " Horse Neck " & around Warwick Cove.

 

After a very brief ride on West Shore Road, we enter Rocky Point.  I am eliminating the Large Hills, we rode in May.  Those in Training, are more than welcome to ride them.  We will do the short, but Beautiful Biking/Walking Path, at Rocky Point.  The Views of the Bay are Gorgeous.  This looks like a Good Place for our Break, at the Beach.  There are Porta Potties here.

 

Those who want,  can head for more  Shoreline at Conimicut or I can take you to Buttonwoods.  Again, this is a Ride, I am still designing, be patient.   I want to stay near the Coast, because it should be cooler.

 

There are plenty of places to go for food, after the Ride.   Some have outdoor seating, for those who transport their Bikes, on the outside of there cars.
item.how_to_find_us: There is a Big Lots, in this Plaza.
item.name: Bike the Shores of Warwick
